serviceName: CertDashboard Site TXT and Cname ssl records
description: Enable domain to work with the CertDashboard by configuring the necessary CNAME and TXT SSL records.
variableDescription: txtAcmeValue: Value for _acme-challenge TXT record, txtCfValue: Value for _cf-custom-hostname TXT record, cdHostname: cert dashboard host name, txtCdValue: cert dashboard txt value, CNameRecordHost : cname host , CNameRecordIP : ip provided by user.
